channel.title: Break Down - Tom Sommerson [Progressive House]
channel.description:
Hi,
I played with vocal chops and I tried to build up a progressive house track. This is the result: https://soundcloud.com/tomsommerson/break-down
What do you think?
Cheers, Tom

item.title: Break Down - Tom Sommerson [Progressive House]
item.dc:creator: tnyari
item.description:
First of all thank you for the constructive comment, but let me continue here instead of on SC.
The funny thing is, that the track was ready within 4 hours, but I worked 5 days on the mixing…
I tried lot of things to find the perfect balance, but maybe I’m noob for mixing…

So, I’m really appreciate, that someone - or, i hope you , could give some hint to me for this track mixing.
Project link: https://app.auxy.co/projects/ntVmCdvkKiO7_tTDxecZXw==

Read full topic

item.title: Break Down - Tom Sommerson [Progressive House]
item.dc:creator: Tazmanian_Ninja
item.description:
Just commented on the track, on SoundCloud:) I hope it’s ok I posted feedback there, rather than here. Thought I’d closed this tab. Else I’d commented here:)

Good stuff
